metadata.description: A vast, abandoned storage facility filled with the remnants of a bygone era. Rows upon rows of rusting shelves are stacked with dusty artifacts, each one whispering secrets of the past to those who dare listen.
metadata.atmosphere: Dreary, nostalgic, and slightly treacherous, with an undercurrent of excitement and possibility.
metadata.significance: Treasure trove for Vivas Guardians seeking rare resources and knowledge, but also a hotbed of rival factions vying for control.
